articles.title: DPRK Ratifies Optional Protocol of UN Convention on Children's Rights
articles.content:
DPRK Ratifies Optional Protocol of UN Convention on Children's Rights
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- The Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK ratified the optional protocol on banning child traffic, prostitution and pornographic literature, annex to the UN Convention on Children's Rights.
					 A decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly on it was promulgated on November 5.
					
					 The permanent representative of the DPRK at the UN inked the protocol at the Headquarters of the UN on September 9 on behalf of its government.
					
					 The DPRK acceded to the UN Convention on Children's Rights in September, 1990.
					
					 Its ratification of the protocol is a demonstration of the government's policy of attaching importance to the children and a manifestation of its will to fulfill its commitment and promote international cooperation in the field of human rights.

articles.title: Greetings to Angolan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Angolan President
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Jose Eduardo Dos Santos, president of Angola, Monday on the occasion of the 39th anniversary of its independence.
					 In the belief that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished the president of Angola greater success in his work to consolidate the national unity and achieve the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Chairperson of Coalition for Mali Clarifies Stand to Boost Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Chairperson of Coalition for Mali Clarifies Stand to Boost Relations with DPRK
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jun Gap, DPRK ambassador to Mali, paid a courtesy call on the chairperson of the Coalition for Mali, on Oct. 28.
					 The chairperson sincerely wished the Korean people greater success in their efforts for the building of a prosperous and powerful state and the reunification of the country, rallied close behind HE Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and supreme leader.
					
					 The chairperson paid the highest tribute to HE Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the WPK, on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of his demise.
					
					 The undying feats he performed for developing the friendly and cooperative bilateral ties and accomplishing the cause of global independence will always be remembered by the Malian people and other progressives, the chairperson said, adding:
					
					 The party, government and people of the DPRK rendered disinterested support and cooperation to the Malian people in their efforts for the building of a new society and socio-economic development, and are extending solidarity to their efforts for the peace of the country, territorial integrity and national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 The chairperson expressed thanks for this on behalf of the president, government and people of Mali.
					
					 All the achievements made by the WPK and the Korean people in the party building and activities and in all fields such as politics, economy and culture and their experience are very valuable to the Coalition for Mali and the Malian people, the chairperson said, adding:
					
					 We will continue boosting the friendly and cooperative ties between the two parties and the two peoples.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifter Bags Three Gold Medals at World Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifter Bags Three Gold Medals at World Championship
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK player Kim Un Guk bagged three gold medals in men's 62kg weightlifting events at the 2014 World Weightlifting Championship to retain a championship.
					 He snatched 150 kg to come first.
					
					 In jerk events he succeeded in 170 kg first to be followed by the successive lifts of 174kg and 175kg to come first.
					
					 He lifted a total of 325 kg, more than 9 kg than other players.
					
					 He is well known among the Koreans and the world weightlifting circle for his successful performance at the 2010 and 2013 World Weightlifting Championships and several other international tournaments.
					
					 He set a new Olympic record in snatch of the men's 62kg category at the 30th Olympic Games, setting a new world record in total points and becoming a gold medalist.
					
					 He renewed record of the Asian Games and the world record in the snatch events at the 17th Asian Games. He also came first in the jerk events at the Games.

articles.title: DPRK Schoolgirl Wins Int'l Juvenile Piano Concours
articles.content:
DPRK Schoolgirl Wins Int'l Juvenile Piano Concours
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- Ma Sin A, a DPRK schoolgirl, came first in the 4th International Juvenile Piano Concours held in Germany.
					 The concours which took place from Oct. 27 to Nov. 6 brought together more than 60 talented juvenile pianists from 22 countries and regions including the DPRK, Russia, Thailand, Germany and the UK.
					
					 The participants divided into group A under 13 and group B from 14 to 17 competed in three phases.
					
					 Ma admirably played music pieces requiring high artistic skills in the first and second phases of group A.
					
					 In the third phase, too, she successfully played compulsory piano concertos to the tune of orchestral music, winning high appreciation and praise of members of the jury and experts.
					
					 She was awarded the prize for the first place and the prize for the best player at the closing ceremony held on Nov. 6.

articles.title: Korean Fine Arts Exhibition Opens in Britain
articles.content:
Korean Fine Arts Exhibition Opens in Britain
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- A fine arts exhibition of the DPRK opened at its embassy in London on Nov. 3.
					 On display in the exhibition hall were Korean paintings, oil paintings, graphic paintings and other fine arts works showing the true picture of Songun Korea growing stronger under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and the efforts being made by the Korean people for building a thriving nation.
					
					 Present at an opening ceremony were British personages of various circles, staff members of the DPRK embassy in London and members of the delegation of the Mansudae Art Studio of the DPRK to the exhibition.
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					 The director of a British fine arts exhibition company said he could witness the eye-opening developments made by the DPRK in the field of culture and art through his visit to it.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the exhibition would offer an occasion in giving worldwide publicity to the true picture of the DPRK making dynamic development and in greatly contributing to the cultural exchange between the two countries.
					
					 Neil Forbes Davidson, member of the House of Lords, said the fine arts pieces on show helped him get a clear understanding of the reality in the DPRK, saying he was convinced that the exhibition would help the world public know better about the DPRK.
					
					 Meanwhile, the British paper Telegraph, BBC and other media aired the opening of the exhibition, accompanied with photos of Kim Jong Un giving field guidance to the Mansudae Art Studio.

articles.title: 15th National Software Exhibition of Educational Institutions Opens
articles.content:
15th National Software Exhibition of Educational Institutions Opens
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- The 15th National Software Exhibition of Educational Institutions opened with due ceremony in the Three-Revolution Exhibition House Monday.
					 On exhibition are more than 1 700 programs of teachers, researchers and students of over 400 educational institutions.
					
					 They include Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, Pyongyang University of Architecture, Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1 and Chongjin Secondary School No. 1.
					
					 The exhibition will offer a good opportunity to introduce and exchange the successes and experience gained in the past.
					
					 The exhibition continues till November 14.

articles.title: National Competition of Talented Kindergarteners Held
articles.content:
National Competition of Talented Kindergarteners Held
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- The 7th national competition of talented kindergarteners took place in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province of the DPRK some days ago.
					 The competition, attended by more than 100 talented children from each province, included such events as calligraphy, painting, sports and intellectual contest.
					
					 What drew attention of experts on sports was the dribbling event of competitors.
					
					 Ri Yon Ok, a teacher of Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1, told KCNA that she was so pleased to see many talented children with high IQ like Choe Sung Gwon from Kinmaul Kindergarten No.1 in Moranbong District, Pyongyang City, who won a special prize in the intellectual contest. 
					
					 Pyongyang City finished first in the competition.

articles.title: Successes Achieved in Multiplying Marine Resources
articles.content:
Successes Achieved in Multiplying Marine Resources
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- The West Sea offshore cultivation institute under the Branch Academy of Fishery in the DPRK has recently achieved successes in multiplying marine resources. 
					 Researchers of the institute succeeded in culturing short neck clam, ragworm and lobster on an industrial basis, thus paving the way for increasing the output of seafood.
					
					 Seen in the sea off Cholsan County, North Phyongan Province are fry cultivation area and necessary facilities for multiplying marine resources.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Escalate Anti-DPRK Psychological Warfare
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Escalate Anti-DPRK Psychological Warfare
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group is working hard to enlarge the light tower on Aegi Hill in the sensitive area along the Military Demarcation Line (MDL).
					 This is a dangerous act of escalating military tensions and conflict and another grave provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 This tower has served as a means for psychological warfare against the DPRK for decades.
					
					 The lighting of the tower had been banned under an agreement reached at the 2nd round of the north-south general-level military talks in June 2004. At the talks both sides agreed to stop propaganda and dismantle its means in the area along the MDL in order to defuse military tensions on the Korean Peninsula and dispel distrust and misunderstanding between the armies of both sides. 
					
					 However, the Lee Myung Bak group, steeped in extreme hostility toward the fellow countrymen in the north, took a measure for resuming the psychological warfare against the DPRK under the pretext of the Cheonan warship incident and Yonphyong Island incident and operated the light tower on Aegi Hill as part of the warfare.
					
					 Shortly ago, the puppet chief executive got angry after belatedly learning about the dismantlement of the tower by the marine corps which was in charge of it. Later the "government" made much fuss, looking into the background against which it was dismantled.
					
					 The puppet forces had worked hard to calm down the criticism from the public at home and abroad, claiming the tower was lit according to the "request of the church" but wicked anti-DPRK organizations and conservative group in south Korea are deeply involved in this warfare.
					
					 The warmongers have been busy with confrontation rackets, lighting the tower in the forefront area and conducting leaflet scattering operations and airing broadcasting programs hurting the social system and dignity of the DPRK.
					
					 The light tower is not just a means for religious events but a symbol of madcap confrontation racket for escalating tensions between the north and the south to an extreme pitch and sparking off armed conflicts by deliberately getting on the nerves of the north.
					
					 The above-said moves are the dangerous acts of igniting a war against the north. Their anti-DPRK psychological warfare including their lighting of the tower has very catastrophic impact on the north-south relations and the situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 No one can predict what would happen in the area where the situation remains tense due to the provocative acts of the enemy.
					
					 The puppet forces had better stop enlarging the tower at once, thinking twice over the grave consequences to be entailed by their reckless actions.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Running Whole Gamut of Gimmicks towards S. Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Running Whole Gamut of Gimmicks towards S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is running the whole gamut of gimmicks towards the south Korean puppet forces.
					 When the puppet forces begged for the indefinite extension of the transfer of the wartime operation control (OPECON) at the recent 46th U.S.-south Korea annual security consultative meeting, the U.S. pretended to reluctantly accept the request while pressurizing south Korea to sign contracts on the sale of military hardware worth an astronomical figure of dollars in return for it.
					
					 This is a typical example of a trick played by the U.S. on its stooges. In word, the U.S. calls south Korea its ally but, in fact, it uses the puppet forces for meeting its own interests.
					
					 As the U.S. holds the right to command the south Korean army, it is fated to be used as bullet shields and cannon fodder any moment at the instructions of the American master.
					
					 As the spirit of achieving independence from the U.S. mounted in south Korea and demands for taking over the OPECON grew stronger, the U.S. could not but transfer the ordinary time operation control in 1994, to begin with. It then agreed to transfer the OPECON to the puppet forces in 2015.
					
					 If this becomes a reality, the U.S.-south Korea "Combined Forces Command" will be left with no justification to stay as it is a tool for the U.S. exercise of the operation control over south Korea.
					
					 Hence, the U.S. has made desperate efforts to build or strengthen legal and institutional mechanisms that can replace the wartime operation control which is indispensable for its forces' presence in south Korea and for its implementation of the strategy for dominating Asia.
					
					 Through the annual security consultative meetings and military commissions with the puppet forces, the U.S. formulated a system whereby it can interfere in all military policies shaped by the puppet forces.
					
					 The U.S. made sure that its nuclear war exercises are staged with south Korea every year strictly under its command.
					
					 Recently it finalized an agreement on creating a new combined division in 2015 involving the main forces of the U.S. second division present in south Korea and the armored troops of the puppet ground force.
					
					 All facts go to prove that all kinds of mechanisms and means will continue to be used to keep the U.S. forces in south Korea and to use the puppet forces as a shock brigade for executing aggression war even after the transfer of the OPECON.
					
					 When the present conservative regime emerged in south Korea, the U.S. availed itself of its ignorance of military affairs and pushed south Korea to the brink of war and created "security unrest" through nuclear war exercises targeting the DPRK. 
					
					 The puppet government had no alternative but to beg its master to extend again the transfer of the OPECON as intended by him and, at the same time, behave like an idiot offering even funds to him.
					
					 The U.S. is a vicious aggressor and plunderer who does not hesitate to make a fool of even its junior ally in order to achieve its hegemonic goal.
					
					 The recent indefinite extension of the transfer of the OPECON is a product of the U.S. premeditated moves to put south Korea under its tighter military control and bring huge profits to the U.S. munitions monopolies.
					
					 The south Koreans from all walks of life should clearly see through the true colors of the U.S. as a gangster and courageously turn out in the struggle against the U.S.

articles.title: All-out Charge for Victoriously Concluding This Year's Drive Called for
articles.content:
All-out Charge for Victoriously Concluding This Year's Drive Called for
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday editorially calls for putting spurs to the drive for victoriously concluding this year's campaign and thus fully displaying the spirit of Songun Korea making dynamic leap forward under the leadership of the great party.
					 This year is of great significance in implementing the party's plan for building a thriving nation, the editorial says, and goes on: 
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un unrolled a grandiose blueprint for the general advance for this year in his historic New Year address and powerfully aroused the entire party and army and all the people to a heroic advance.
					
					 He has energetically led the grand drive for building a thriving nation, always standing in the van of the ranks for general advance since the outset of the new year.
					
					 The army and people of the country intensely loyal to the party and the leader have waged an intensive charge since the beginning of this year's drive with extraordinary will and enthusiasm. They have fully demonstrated the might of the single-minded unity of the party and the revolutionary ranks that has been cemented in the general advance of the new century of Juche and Songun Korea's high stamina of courageously weathering all sorts of hardships and difficulties in the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu. The vicious and persistent anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers could not hold in check the dynamic advance of the DPRK.
					
					 This year's drive proved once again that the ideology and strength of the DPRK are matchless and Korean style is the best and nothing can arrest the sacred cause of the Korean people dashing ahead to attain their grandiose ideal and goal.
					
					 The editorial calls on all people to thoroughly carry out the militant tasks set forth in the New Year address and thus become honorable victors in the general advance for this year.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Regime's Sheer Sophism to Justify Its Acts to Escalate Confrontation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Regime's Sheer Sophism to Justify Its Acts to Escalate Confrontation
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the DPRK through the statement of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea clarified its crucial stand that there would be neither north-south dialogue nor improvement of inter-Korean relations unless the south Korean authorities halt the leaflet scattering operations.
					The south Korean authorities, however, in a "statement" expressed "strong regret," asserting that "the north's statement was falsification of a fact." They are misleading the public opinion by creating impression that the second round of the north-south high-level contact was aborted due to the attitude of the north, urging it to withdraw "unreasonable preconditions" and "change its stand."
					
					Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an article in this regard:
					
					"Falsification of a fact" and "unreasonable preconditions" touted by the south Korean authorities are nothing but sophism intended to cover up their confrontational nature and justify their provocations to the DPRK.
					
					The puppet authorities are employing such a crafty method as wire-pulling and helping human scum and ultra-right conservative organizations behind the scene in the leaflet scattering operations.
					
					All facts go to clearly prove that the puppet authorities are the arch criminals escalating the leaflet scattering operations against the DPRK and the south Korean chief executive is their backstage wirepuller.
					
					The south Korean authorities are wholly to blame for the chilled atmosphere of mending the inter-Korean relations though it had been created with much effort and for their plunge into another abyss of catastrophe as they have connived, shielded and encouraged human scum's leaflet scattering operations.
					
					If the south Korean authorities persistently pursue hostility towards the compatriots and confrontation with the DPRK, far from drawing a lesson from the present catastrophe of the north-south relations, this will only precipitate their shameful destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan War Exercises
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan War Exercises
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- The 8th corps of the south Korean puppet army is mulling staging drills for carrying out the operation plan in the coastal areas of 6 cities and counties of Kangwon Province of south Korea from November 10 to 14, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 The warmongers are trying to hurl lots of aggressor troops into the war exercises for examining the combat posture under the simulated condition of an all-out war.
					
					 The 17th infantry division of the puppet army staged a north-targeted drill in the area along the River Han in Kimpho City, Kyonggi Province near the Military Demarcation Line on Nov. 6, firing bullets and shells.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Submission to America Accused in Germany
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Submission to America Accused in Germany
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- Ri Jun Sik, a Korean in Germany, issued a statement on Oct. 30 denouncing the south Korean puppet group for its act of submitting to the U.S.
					 The statement accused the south Korean authorities of postponing the transfer of the right to wartime operation control (OPECON) for an indefinite time, noting this puts the life, wealth and security of the south Korean people under the thumb of the U.S.
					
					 The south Korean media and various circles call Oct. 24 when the authorities declared the indefinite extension of the transfer of OPECON the "day of disgrace when the security was officially given up", blaming Park Geun Hye for kowtowing to America, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 During the past "presidential election" campaign, Park Geun Hye promised to surely get back the OPECON by 2015 as scheduled. But the reality clearly shows that her promise such as the "great unity of the people", "democratization of economy" and "normal pension" were all farce aimed at her winning in the election.
					
					 South Korea, the colony of the U.S., is the only place in the world that leaves its military sovereignty at the tender mercy of foreign forces.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Stop Enlarging Tower on Aegi Hill
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Stop Enlarging Tower on Aegi Hill
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities recently announced a plan to dismantle a light tower on Aegi Hill and install instead a new observation deck and an electronic display board more than double the existing ones and build a hall showing scenes of the June 25 war as part of their psychological warfare with an investment of tens of billions of won.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is an open declaration for escalating psychological campaign against the DPRK and another serious military provocation to it. 
					
					 The light tower has been a typical means for psychological warfare against the DPRK. It has been a source of sparking off confrontation and tensions between the north and the south, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet forces' moves have fully disclosed their crafty nature.
					
					 They are getting vocal grumbling that the "high-level contact was aborted" due to the "provocation" by someone while jabbering they would "make sustained efforts for the development of the south-north relations". But no one would lend an ear to it.
					
					 The reality clearly proves that the "dialogue" and "improvement of relations" touted by the puppet forces are a sheer lie and that they only pursue confrontation with fellow countrymen and armed conflict.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not gamble over the fate of the nation. History and the nation will never tolerate it.
					
					 They should immediately stop the project for enlarging the tower aimed at escalating the military tension and conflict and discontinue acts of going against the improvement of the north-south ties.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage North-targeted War Maneuver
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage North-targeted War Maneuver
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- The 2nd corps of the south Korean puppet army announced its plan to stage field mobile drill in the areas of Chunchon and Hwachon of south Korean Kangwon Province from Nov. 10 to 14, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 The warmongers are mulling hurling units and more than 2 000 military hardware under the corps into the war maneuver under the pretext of coping with "local war provocation and all-out war" of someone.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Nigerian Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Nigerian Personages
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- Events were held in Nigeria on November 3 and 4 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a remembrance meeting, book and photo exhibition and film show in Nasarawa and Zamfara states and Port Harcourt.
					
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were photos dealing with the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il and the Songun leadership exploits of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display there also were works of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the army and people of the DPRK building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "E-library of Kim Il Sung University".
					
					 The former governor of Nasarawa State who is senator said that Kim Jong Il ushered in a new era of building a thriving socialist nation in the DPRK.
					
					 A former member of the House of Representatives said that Kim Jong Il started the Songun leadership with the field guidance to a guard unit of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960.
					
					 A permanent secretary of the government of Zamfara State noted that the works of the great leaders of the DPRK serve as a beacon and an encyclopedia brightly illuminating the way ahead of humankind.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Kuwait
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Kuwait
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- A Kuwaiti committee for honoring the memory of leader Kim Jong Il was formed on October 30.
					 Yousfe Al Amiri, president of the Kuwait House of Works who doubles as chairman of the Kuwait-DPRK Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the memorial committee.
					
					 The committee set days from October 30 to December 17 as remembrance period and decided to publish works of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and hold political and cultural events such as a remembrance meeting, seminar, photo exhibition and film show in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- The Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany posted on its website an article praising the political caliber of Marshal Kim Jong Un on Oct. 31.
					 The article praised Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission, for leading socialist Korea to victory despite the challenges of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces and turns and twists of history.
					
					 It termed his politics one based on philosophical thought, steadfast determination and transparent faith and mysterious one that nobody can predict.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Nigeria
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "To Protect National Heritage Is a Patriotic Undertaking for Adding Brilliance to the History and Traditions of Our Nation" on its website on November 5.
					 The work, published on October 24, Juche 103 (2014), clarifies that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il attached importance to the work of protecting national heritage and made efforts to glorify the long history and brilliant culture of the Korean nation in the whole period of their revolutionary leadership.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for defending the immortal exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and further glorifying the history and traditions of the Korean nation by thoroughly carrying out the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea on protecting the national heritage.

articles.title: Pakistani Paper Assails U.S. "Human Rights" Campaign against DPRK
articles.content:
Pakistani Paper Assails U.S. "Human Rights" Campaign against DPRK
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- The Pakistani paper Parliament Times on Oct. 31 carried an article denouncing the anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign kicked off by hostile forces.
					 Recalling that the report of the DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies which most comprehensively and correctly reflects the human rights the Korean people enjoy as the masters of the country was distributed as an official document of the UN General Assembly and the UN Security Council, the article went on:
					
					 The report has drawn strong support and sympathy of the international community since its publication.
					
					 Briefings took place in various parts of the U.S. including New York to let the public have a clear understanding of the report.
					
					 Appreciating it as the document comprehensively dealing with the advantageous human rights situation in the DPRK, many countries have responded with keen interest to its efforts for further promoting the human rights of its popular masses and boosting international cooperation.
					
					 Meanwhile, they are becoming vocal ridiculing and censuring the "human rights report" cooked up by the U.S. and its followers as it is just a mixture of wild guesses and bad blood toward the DPRK without a reference to the state policy of the country for the promotion of genuine human rights.
					
					 The anti-DPRK "resolution" the hostile forces are going to table for discussion at the UN General Assembly session is a typical example of double standards. So, the countries calling for the promotion of genuine human rights should check it.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever make its every possible effort to resolutely foil the hostile forces' persistent anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign, firmly defend the most advantageous Korean-style socialist system and provide its people with more excellent conditions for enjoying human rights.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita nonagesimo cumpleanos de Yazov
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita nonagesimo cumpleanos de Yazov
Pyongyang, 10 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio una carta personal de felicitacion, regalo y cesto de flores al mariscal Yazov, ex ministro de Defensa de la URSS, con motivo de su nonagesimo cumpleanos.
					Los traslado el dia 8 al mariscal el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Hyon Yong Chol, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, de visita en Rusia para felicitar su cumpleanos.

articles.title: Putin se reune con Hyon Yong Chol
articles.content:
Putin se reune con Hyon Yong Chol
Pyongyang, 10 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, se reunio el dia 8 con el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Hyon Yong Chol, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, de visita en Rusia para felicitar el nonagesimo cumpleanos del ex ministro de Defensa de la URSS, mariscal Yazov.
					Transcurrieron en una atmosfera amistosa las conversaciones entre el mandatario anfitrion y el visitante coreano.

articles.title: RPDC firma protocolo selectivo de Convenio de ONU para Derechos Infantiles
articles.content:
RPDC firma protocolo selectivo de Convenio de ONU para Derechos Infantiles
Pyongyang, 10 de noviembre (ACNC) -- La Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea aprobo el protocolo selectivo sobre la prohibicion de la compraventa, la prostitucion y la literatura pornografica, de la infancia, documento anexo del Convenio de la ONU para los Derechos Infantiles.
					Quedo publicado el dia 5 el correspondiente decreto del Presidium de la APS de la RPDC.
					
					Con anterioridad, el representante permanente de la RPDC ante la ONU firmo el 9 de septiembre en representacion del gobierno en la sede de la ONU el protocolo arriba mencionado.
					
					La RPDC se ingreso en septiembre de 1990 en el Convenio de la ONU para los Derechos Infantiles.
					
					La aprobacion del presente protocolo es la demostracion de la politica del gobierno de la RPDC de dar importancia a la infancia y de su voluntad de asumir con todo su deber en la rama de DDHH y promover la cooperacion internacional.

articles.title: Om Yun Chol se hizo doble campeon mundial de levantamiento de pesas
articles.content:
Om Yun Chol se hizo doble campeon mundial de levantamiento de pesas
Pyongyang, 10 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El pesista de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea Om Yun Chol obtuvo el dia 8 la medallas de oro en el Campeonato Mundial de Levantamiento de Pesas, asi que se hizo doble campeon mundial.
					En el certamen efectuado en Kazajstan participaron mas de 530 pesistas excelentes de ambos sexos provenientes de mas de 70 paises y regiones.
					
					En la competencia de la division de 56kg (m), Om levanto 168kg en envion, en total 296kg, de manera que ganaron las medallas de oro en envion y en total.
					
					Om es el ganador de la medalla de oro de los XXX Juegos Olimpicos y campeon de la Competencia Mundial de Levantamiento de Pesas 2013.

articles.title: Kim Un Guk gana 3 medallas de oro en campeonato mundial
articles.content:
Kim Un Guk gana 3 medallas de oro en campeonato mundial
Pyongyang, 10 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El pesista de la republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Un Guk, se corono campeon al conquistar 3 medallas de oro en la division de 62kg del Campeonato Mundial de Levantamiento de Pesas 2014.
					El ocupo primer lugar en el arranque al levantar 150kg.
					
					En el envion tambien se clasifico primero al levantar sucesivamente 170kg, 174kg y 175kg.
					
					Asi se corono campeon mundial con un total de 325kg, 9kg mas que sus rivales.
					
					El muchacho es bien conocido por el pueblo coreano y en el circulo mundial de levantamiento de pesas por sus relevantes exitos logrados en varias competencias internacionales, inclusive los campeonatos mundiales de 2010 y 2013.
					
					Se hizo medallista de oro de los XXX Juegos Olimpicos al establecer el record olimpico en el arranque y la plusmarca mundial en el total.
					
					En los XVII Juegos Asiaticos renovo en el arranque el record de Juegos Asiaticos, el de Asia y el mundial y ocupo el primer lugar en envion.

articles.title: Ma Sin A sobresale en concurso internacional de piano
articles.content:
Ma Sin A sobresale en concurso internacional de piano
Pyongyang, 10 de noviembre (ACNC) -- La alumna coreana Ma Sin A ocupo el primer lugar en el 4o Concurso Internacional de Juniores de Piano, efectuado del 27 de octubre al 6 de noviembre en Alemania.
					En el presente certamen tomaron parte mas de 60 pianistas provenientes de los 22 paises y regiones incluyendo la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Rusia, Tailandia, Alemania y Gran Bretana.
					
					En el concurso, los alumnos compitieron sus capacidades en los 3 grados divididos en la categoria A (para los ninos con menos de 13 anos de edad) y la B (para los de 14-17 anos de edad).
					
					Ma, ejecuto excelentemente en el primer y segundo grado con solo de piano las piezas indicadas que demandan el arte adiestrado de ejecucion y alta habilidad.
					
					Tambien en el tercer grado ejecuto delicado y vigorosamente los indicados conciertos para piano al compas de la orquesta y gozo de buena reputacion de los jurados y especialistas.
					
					En la ceremonia clausural efectuada el dia 6, fue conferido a ella el premio del primer lugar y el supremo de ejecucion.

articles.title: ACNC condena intento de ampliar torre de farol en el pico Aegi
articles.content:
ACNC condena intento de ampliar torre de farol en el pico Aegi
Pyongyang, 10 de noviembre (ACNC) -- La banda titere surcoreana trata de ampliar la torre de farol en el pico Aegi que existe por varias decadas como medio simbolico de la guerra psicologica contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El intento de ampliarla en los alrededores de la delicada Linea de Demarcacion Militar es acto peligroso que causa la tension militar y el choque armado y otra grave provocacion contra la RPDC.
					
					En las 2a conversaciones militares a nivel de general Norte-Sur efectuadas en junio de 2004, ambas partes de Corea acordaron cesar las actividades de propaganda en la region de la linea de demarcacion militar y remover los medios de propaganda contra otra parte para relajar la tension militar de la Peninsula Coreana y eliminar la desconfianza y malentendimiento entre los ejercitos de ambas partes. Segun el acuerdo, se habia suspendido la encendida del farol en la torre del pico Aegi.
					
					Pero, la banda de Lee Myung Bak presa de la extrema hostilidad a la parte connacional, declaro la reanudacion de la guerra psicologica contra la RPDC so pretexto del incidente del hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan" y el de la isla Yonphyong y, como parte de ello, volvio a poner en operacion la torre de farol.
					
					Al saber que la torre fue removida por los infantes de marina que la cuidaban, la mandataria surcoreana armo escandalo mientras el "gobierno" abrio la investigacion. Al cabo de este alboroto, se tomo la decision de ampliarla.
					
					Anteriormente, los titeres surcoreanos trataron de eludir las criticas de la opinion interna y externa disparateando que la encendida del farol se hizo por la "solicitud de iglesia", pero en esta locura estan involucradas las connotadas entidades anti-RPDC y los conservadores surcoreanos.
					
					Desde la torre, ellos enviaron volantes hacia el Norte y transmitieron programas radiales para insultar el regimen y la dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					La encendida del farol y otras formas de guerra psicologica ejercen consecuencias catastroficas sobre las relaciones Norte-Sur y la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Tales acciones provocativas hacen imprevisible el desenvolvimiento de la situacion de esa zona candente.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben actuar con prudencia y desistir su intento de ampliar la torre en cuestion.
